name: Reckless Getaway VS
description:
Race, smash and crash for cash prizes in this reckless car chase simulator.

This special edition of Reckless Getaway features the Skillz game platform.

Reckless Getaway VS lets you become a master getaway driver in the car chase of your life. Evade the cops, feds and army while wreaking havoc in classic Hollywood style.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

Features:
- Skillz game platform – Play for cash prizes against other players around the world.
- Quick and easy-to-learn controls
- Fun and intense car chase action
- Free-roaming levels
